settings.name: Maximum roosting speed
settings.description: Insert maximum speed that your roosting animal can have (in m/s)

settings.name: Minimum roost duration
settings.description: Inset minimum duration (in h) that your animal has to be in a refined area to be considred roosting. If roost raidus is given, default here to 1 hour.

settings.name: Maximum roost radius
settings.description: Inset maximum radius (in m) of an area that you animal has to be refined to for being considered roost. If roost duration is given, default here to 1000 = 1km.
